title: Rehabilitating Forest Ecosystems
description: Restored over 5,000 hectares of degraded forest in Southeast Asia, enabling native species to thrive once again.

title: Elephant Corridor Preservation
description: Secured safe migration routes for over 500 elephants in Africa through land agreements and partnerships.

title: Ocean Clean-Up Drives
description: Removed over 2,000 tons of plastic waste from marine environments, ensuring safer habitats for aquatic species.

title: Tiger Population Revival
description: Increased the tiger population in the wild by 15% through breeding programs and habitat conservation in South Asia.
